attributes.action: we would like anti bacterial gels to be given out for free
attributes.additional_details: Stop people selling them for mad price on ebay or other onlines
attributes.background: Ant bacterial gels can not be found govnor needs to find something to help people protect themselfs

departments.name: Department of Health and Social Care

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300758

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
